alert.note: Alert for Warren (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 1:32AM EDT until July 25 at 2:15AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Warren County in north central Pennsylvania... * Until 215 AM EDT. * At 132 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Grand Valley, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sheffield, Chapman State Park, Tidioute and Clarendon. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
